text:
I still use FTP where I can for assets like that, but more and more portals are using 2FA.

I believe the asset files beta just launched for uploading assets through the CLI, but other than that, I just put all the assets for the project I'm working on in a folder and upload the parent into the file manager.

<@U26BLKGE4> thanks! yeah, I am trying to get a more automated process in place so that I can watch a folder for files changes and upload just that file if it changes. super helpful when making quick edits to svg infographics and the like
